strings.error blocka dns in filtering mode: Blokada DNS is currently supported only in Plus mode. Please choose another DNS and try again.
strings.main ask for permissions description: ब्लोकडा विज्ञापनों को ब्लॉक करने के लिए वीपीएन कॉन्फ़िगरेशन का उपयोग कर रहा है। आपको इसे अगले चरण में अनुमति देने के लिए कहा जाएगा।
strings.advanced section slugline apps: Choose apps that should never be blocked
strings.advanced section slugline encryption: Adjust your encryption level and DNS
strings.advanced action slim migrate to full: You are using Blokada Slim. Learn more
strings.networks section label: Adjust settings for WiFi and mobile networks
strings.networks action network specific: Tap here to modify default settings. To make the app behave differently on some networks, tap below.
strings.networks label configuration inactive: Tap to modify settings for this network
strings.networks label details default network: The settings below are applied by default for all networks. You can override them for selected networks (in the previous screen).
strings.networks label specific network: Adjust what should happen when your device connects to this network.
strings.networks label specific network type: Adjust what should happen when your device connects to a network of this type.
strings.networks permission request: To have more control, tap here and let the app recognise all networks.
strings.networks permission request granted: You may see a notification when Blokada reads your network name in the background.
strings.networks summary encrypt dns: Blokada will encrypt DNS if possible. This improves your security and prevents malicious actors to spy on what websites and apps you use.
strings.networks summary use dns: Blokada will use %s as your device's DNS. Choosing the one that allows for encryption (has the lock icon), and is near to you, will help protecting your data and making your connection fast.
strings.networks summary network dns: Blokada will use the network's DNS if available, or switch to %s otherwise. Also, the Encrypt DNS settings will be ignored whenever network DNS is used. Using the network's DNS helps to fix connectivity problems on troublesome networks, but leaves you unprotected.
strings.networks summary network dns and plus mo: Blokada will temporarily disable Plus Mode whenever network DNS is used. This is because it is not possible to access network DNS in VPN. The Plus Mode will be automatically restored when your device switches to another network.
strings.networks summary blocka plus mode: Blokada will use Blokada DNS in Plus mode, to ensure high level of encryption and speed. You may change this setting at the bottom of the Choose DNS screen.
strings.networks summary force libre mode: Blokada will always use Libre mode on this network, and ignore your Blokada Plus location. This is useful for networks where you do not want the additional protection.
strings.networks permission dialog: Blokada can recognize networks you connect to, and let you configure separate settings for them. However, this app will collect location data in the form of network name to enable this feature, even when the app is closed or not in use. Sometimes you may see a system notification about location access - Blokada will only read the network's name.
strings.account status text libre: Your BLOKADA Libre account is active until forever.
strings.account encrypt desc dns only: डोमेन नेम सिस्टम यह है कि आपकी डिवाइस को पता है कि आप जिन वेबसाइटों पर जाना चाहते हैं, उन्हें कहां खोजें। दुर्भाग्य से, अधिकांश इंटरनेट अभी भी अनएन्क्रिप्टेड डीएनएस का उपयोग करता है, जो आपके ब्राउज़िंग इतिहास को जासूसी करने के जोखिम में डालता है। जब सक्षम किया जाता है, तो Blokada आपके डिवाइस को केवल एन्क्रिप्टेड DNS सर्वर (जिसे DNS को HTTPS भी कहा जाता है) से कनेक्ट करने के लिए मजबूर कर रहा है।
strings.account encrypt desc everything: आपका डिवाइस हमारे सुरक्षित वीपीएन सर्वर, और सभी संचार से आने वाले या, आपके डिवाइस को मजबूत एल्गोरिदम का उपयोग करके एन्क्रिप्ट किया जा रहा है। यह आपकी व्यक्तिगत जानकारी को सुरक्षित रखता है, जैसे बैंकिंग विवरण या व्यक्तिगत फ़ोटो, असुरक्षित स्थानों में चोरी होने से, कॉफी शॉप वाईफाई की तरह।
strings.account encrypt header explanation: DNS है कि आपका डिवाइस जानता है कि वेबसाइटों को कहां खोजना है। BLOKADA केवल एन्क्रिप्टेड सर्वर का समर्थन करता है।
strings.account encrypt label use blocka dns: Use Blokada DNS in Plus mode
strings.apps filter header: Which apps would you like to see?
strings.intro text:
A blue ring means that Blokada is working.

Remember, some ads, like YouTube, cannot be blocked. However, you will notice a difference in many other apps.

We recommend you activate Always on VPN / Connect on Demand in your system settings.
strings.intro text not libre:
A blue or orange ring means that Blokada is working.

We recommend you activate Always on VPN in your system settings.
